caller_intent: Inform the caller about an insurance quote for two vehicles (Volkswagen and Acura) with liability-only coverage, including premium details and payment options.
resolution_steps: Provided the monthly premium amount ($12.95) for the quoted policy.
Explained payment options: bank draft or annual full payment (12x monthly rate).
Offered to follow up if the caller had questions or needed further assistance.
Provided contact information (phone number and extension).
knowledge_required: Payment methods for insurance policies (bank draft, annual payment)
summary: Gary from Alliance Insurance provided an insurance quote for liability-only coverage on two vehicles, outlined payment options, and offered to follow up. The caller was informed of the $12.95 monthly premium and instructed to contact Gary directly for next steps.
